metadata.title: Pastech | Technology for Precision Pasture Management
metadata.description: We measure, analyze, and manage pastures with connected tools that transform data into productive and sustainable decisions.

pasturometer.title: Pasturometer
pasturometer.description: Precise measurement of grass height and density

drone.title: Pastech Drone
drone.description: Analysis with autonomous flights and mapping

hero.title: Technology for Pasture Management with
hero.description: We measure, analyze, and manage pastures with connected tools that transform data into productive and sustainable decisions.

about.title: Our Approach
about.paragraph1: At Pastech, we believe that the future of livestock farming is built with information, commitment, and collaboration.
about.paragraph2: That's why we unite science, technology, and the experience of producers to transform the way pasture is managed.
about.paragraph3: Our purpose is to accompany producers in every decision, offering precise, simple, and validated tools that turn data into knowledge and knowledge into more efficient, sustainable, and humane production.
about.paragraph4: We are a team that works from the field and for the field, convinced that measuring well means producing better.

features.title: Our Process
features.subtitle: Three pillars that transform your field management

measurement.title: Measurement
measurement.description: Electronic grass measurement device that facilitates accurate data collection in the field, eliminating manual errors.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Remote monitoring of grass stock. We provide the exact data so you know forage availability in real time.

management.title: Management
management.description: Comprehensive management in livestock establishments. We transform information into decisions to optimize utilization.

solutions.title: Our Solutions
solutions.subtitle: Integrated tools for every stage of the production cycle, from measurement to decision-making.

pasturometer.title: Electronic Pasturometer
pasturometer.description: Portable device that estimates field forage availability in seconds.

satellite.title: Pastech Satellite
satellite.description: Satellite image analysis to monitor large areas of land and detect anomalies.

drone.title: Pastech Drone
drone.description: Continuous pasture monitoring through satellite images and vegetative indices (NDVI, biomass, vigor).

intelligent.title: AI-Powered Grazing
intelligent.description: High-resolution aerial surveys to validate management practices and perform specific diagnostics.

grazingManagement.title: Intelligent Grazing Management
grazingManagement.description: Comprehensive platform that centralizes all your field data for strategic and efficient decision-making.

pasturometer.longDescription: Portable device that estimates field forage availability in seconds. Measures grass height and density using precision sensors and automatically syncs data with the Pastech platform.
benefits: Direct integration with other Pastech modules

satellite.longDescription: Pastech Satellite uses state-of-the-art satellite imagery to monitor large areas of land, detect anomalies, and analyze pasture evolution over time.

drone.longDescription: Continuous pasture monitoring through satellite images and vegetative indices (NDVI, biomass, vigor). Compare campaigns, detect variations, and plan forage use with precise and up-to-date information.

intelligent.longDescription: High-resolution aerial surveys providing detailed information to validate management practices and perform specific diagnostics. Data integrates with field measurements and satellite monitoring, offering a complete system view.
benefits: Ideal for trials or problem areas

grazingManagement.longDescription: The Intelligent Grazing Management platform centralizes all your field data in one place, enabling a comprehensive view and strategic, efficient decision-making.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Pastech es un equipo interdisciplinario que une la experiencia del campo con la ciencia y la tecnología. Juntamos el mundo del agro y el mundo de la tecnología, para hacer un manejo inteligente del pasto, con el objetivo de lograr un impacto económico y ambiental.

alliances.title: Strategic Alliances
alliances.description: Pastech works with institutions, universities, and companies that drive innovation in agriculture.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Producers and advisors who are already transforming their management with Pastech.

carlos.name: Carlos Rodríguez
carlos.content: Since implementing Pastech, we have optimized our stocking rate by 20%. The data precision is impressive.

maria.name: María González
maria.content: The satellite tool allows us to monitor fields remotely with incredible ease. It's a game changer for technical consulting.

estancia.name: Estancia El Amanecer
estancia.content: The technical support and quality of information have allowed us to make much better decisions during critical drought moments.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: The latest news about technology, events, and launches.

launch.title: Launch of the New Pasturometer 3.0
launch.description: Greater precision and satellite connectivity in our flagship device.

expo.title: Pastech at Rural Expo 2024
expo.description: Visit our stand and discover the latest innovations in livestock technology.

alliance.title: Strategic Alliance with INTA
alliance.description: We signed an agreement to validate new sustainability metrics.

contact.title: Let's Talk About Your Field
contact.subtitle: Leave us your details and a specialist will contact you to advise you on the best solution for your establishment.

footer.description: Technology for precision pasture management. We transform data into productive and sustainable decisions.
